metadata.description: Pre-built templates for social media posts, emails, and fitness content

motivational.title: Progress Not Perfection
Comparison Trap
Your Kids Are Watching
motivational.template:
Your kids are watching.

Show them what {trait} looks like.

üí™ They see you wake up early
üí™ They see you choose the workout
üí™ They see you choose yourself

You're changing theirs.

educational.title: Myth Buster

example_fill.myth: You need to do hours of cardio to lose weight
example_fill.truth: Strength training + calorie deficit is MORE effective
example_fill.explanation_point_1: ‚Üí Muscle burns more calories at rest
example_fill.explanation_point_2: ‚Üí Strength training preserves muscle during weight loss
example_fill.explanation_point_3: ‚Üí Cardio alone can lead to muscle loss + slower metabolism
example_fill.key_lesson: Lift weights, eat in a deficit, add SOME cardio. That's the formula.
